title: No, There Was No Secret Geoengineering Test in the Arctic
content: Claims about secretive Arctic climate manipulation are unfounded...

title: CO2 levels at record highs
content: Atmospheric CO2 levels reached 419 ppm in 2023, the highest in human history.

title: Wind energy now cheaper than coal
content: In many regions, wind power costs less per MWh than coal, according to the IEA.
